aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Hi, I'm Kidus Wegayehu Gurmu, a dedicated PCB designer and electrical engineer. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for innovation, I specialize in creating efficient and high-quality embedded systems that meet modern technological demands. My journey in electronics began with a fascination for how things work, leading me to develop a strong foundation in circuit design, prototyping, and system integration.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my favorite projects.

list.name: SDTMS
list.description: A remote and realtime distribution transformer monitoring hardware system with a machine learning and web interface.

list.name: CleanAir
list.description: A realtime air quality monitoring hardware with a web interface

list.name: hardware XO
list.description: hardware based tic tac toe game with different levels also Ai oponent implemented on AVR microcontrollers

list.name: Hospital floor plan
list.description: A 6 storey hospital electrical installation design done using AUTOCAD

list.name: 8 Bit AlU
list.description: 8 bit Arithemetic and logic unit done using Proteus

list.name: Translator App
list.description: A dictionary app to translate english to Amharic using android studio-java
